creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: circular piece of multicolored marble, surrounded by dark finished wood molding; square frame of dark wood with lighter insets surrounding marble circle; C-shaped metal hanger
markings: untranslated inscriptions on marble; \'42\', on sticker, LL corner of frame; Sydney Moss sticker, on back; \'199\', on sticker, on back
title: Circular Stone Painting, One of a Pair
